item.title: Jessica add a quote by Rick Warren
item.description: "Relationships are always worth restoring." -- Rick Warren

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better, too." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "People are capable, at any time in their lives, of doing what they dream of." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Everything tells me that I am about to make a wrong decision, but making mistakes is just part of life. What does the world want of me? Does it want me to take no risks, to go back to where I came from because I didn't have the courage to say "yes" to life?" -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Everyone seems to have a clear idea of how other people should lead their lives, but none about his or her own." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "We are afraid of losing what we have, whether it's our life or our possessions and property. But this fear evaporates when we understand that our life stories and the history of the world were written by the same hand." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Don't think about what you've left behind" The alchemist said to the boy as they began to ride across the sands of the desert. "If what one finds is made of pure matter, it will never spoil. And one can always come back. If what you had found was only a moment of light, like the explosion of a star, you would find nothing on your return." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "No life is a waste," the Blue Man said. "The only time we waste is the time we spend thinking we're alone." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Sometimes when you sacrifice something precious, you're not really losing it. You're just passing it on to someone else." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Tom Clancy
item.description: "The difference between fiction and reality? Fiction has to make sense." -- Tom Clancy

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Meister Eckhart
item.description: "If the only prayer you said was thank you, that would be enough." -- Meister Eckhart

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Mark Andrus
item.description: "I can tell you I love you as many times as you can stand to hear it, but all it does is remind us that love is not enough. Not even close." -- Mark Andrus

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "Love is the ultimate outlaw. It just won't adhere to any rules. The most any of us can do is to sign on as its accomplice. Instead of vowing to honor and obey, maybe we should swear to aid and abet. That would mean that security is out of the question. The words "make" and "stay" become inappropriate. My love for you has no strings attached. I love you for free." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Celine Dion
item.description: "What do you say to taking chances?" -- Celine Dion

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Baz Luhrmann and Craig Pearce
item.description: "Don't be reckless with other people's hearts, And don't put up with people that are reckless with yours." -- Baz Luhrmann and Craig Pearce

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "Grown-ups never understand anything by themselves, and it is tiresome for children to be always and forever explaining things to them" -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde
